name: Tresemme Botanique Nourish and Replenish Shampoo
description: Always on the look out for products inspired by nature? Stop the search. Tresemme has found a way to infuse a blend of nutrient rich botanicals with professional quality formulas. The result TRESemme Botanique a collection completely free from parabens and dyes, to help reveal your hairs natural beauty. A botanical blend of olive oil and camelia oil, it gently cleanses and nourishes your hair. It leaves your hair feeling moisturized and beautifully soft. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
